issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Code:
{code:javascript}
row.hasDetail = true; // 1
row.hasChild = true; // 2
row.hasCheck = true; // 3
row.hasCheck = false; // 4
row.hasDetail = true; // 5

{code}
Expected behaviour:
# row shows "has detail" mark
# row shows "has child" mark
# row shows "has check" mark
# row shows "has child" mark
# row shows "has child" mark
fields.summary: MobileWeb: need to hide other TableViewRow right marks when showing new marks

comments.body: Closing ticket as MobileWeb is no longer supported.
